接口 IUserClient

  • 所有已知实现类:
    UserClientImpl

    @FeignClient(contextId="userClient",
             value="${gx-cloud.serve.gx-cloud-system.service-id}",
             fallbackFactory=UserFallbackFactory.class)
public interface IUserClient
    用户接口 Feign 调用

      • getUserByUsername

        @GetMapping(value="v1/user/username/{username}")
cn.gx.tool.core.result.R<OAuth2UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable(value="username")

cn.gx.tool.core.result.R<java.lang.String> login(@RequestBody
